description: Attacks made by one of this creature's natural attacks leave vicious wounds.

sections.text:
Choose one of the creature's natural attack forms (not an unarmed strike). The damage for this natural attack increases by one step on the following list, as if the creature's size had increased by one category. Damage dice increase as follows: 1d2, 1d3, 1d4, 1d6, 1d8, 2d6, 3d6, 4d6, 6d6, 8d6, 12d6.

A weapon or attack that deals 1d10 points of damage increases as follows: 1d10, 2d8, 3d8, 4d8, 6d8, 8d8, 12d8.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: This feat can be taken multiple times. Each time it is taken, it applies to a different natural attack.
sections.name: Special

name: Improved Natural Attack
